diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Malignant mixed m√ºllerian tumor (carcinosarcoma) of the uterus, with a PIK3CA mutation.
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient's vaginal bleeding and biopsy results indicated a poorly differentiated malignant neoplasm suggestive of carcinosarcoma. The age of the patient and the findings from the ultrasound and pathological examination supported the diagnosis, aligning with statistics that indicate a high prevalence of cancer in postmenopausal women with similar symptoms.
